column1: Undómë was one of the Elves names for the hour of star-opening at the end of the day: that is
column2: dusk. Undómë was the Quenya name for this time
column3: with the Sindarin equivalent being aduial. There was also a poetic Mannish translation
column5: the dim light of evening).  This word is the source of Arwens surname Undómiel
